name: The Return of Fuko
description:
Fuko was banished from the Hookah Bar in his city.

He knows he has to go back in to flirt with the girls.

But on his way to the Hookah bar, there are a lot of guys who won't let him in.

Features:

  • search for tabak on your way to the Hookah
  • try to dodge the bad guys on the way to the Hookah

Controls:


KeyboardGamepadMoveA, DLeft Stick
JumpSpaceSouth ButtonEnter RoomFNorth Button

Credits:
